name: react-jsonschema-form
description: monorepo for react-jsonschema-form and its themes

scripts.clean-build: rimraf packages/*/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rimraf packages/*/lib && rimraf packages/*/dist && pnpm build
scripts.start: echo 'use "pnpm build" from main directory and then "pnpm start" in the playground package'
scripts.bump-all-packages: echo 'NOTE: Make sure to sanity check the playground locally before commiting changes' && pnpm update --save && pnpm install && pnpm lint && pnpm build && pnpm test
scripts.refresh-node-modules: rimraf packages/*/node_modules && rimraf node_modules && npm install
scripts.commit-package-changes: git add package-lock.json packages/*/package*.json && cross-env CI=skipPrecommit git commit -m 'updated package*.json after versioning' && git push
scripts.post-versioning: echo 'This will take a while...' && pnpm bump-peer-deps && pnpm refresh-node-modules && pnpm commit-package-changes && pnpm update-version-tags
scripts.update-version-tags: git tag -f $(node scripts/get-version-tag.js) && git push -f origin $(node scripts/get-version-tag.js)
